dmca.title: Case ID 142141238 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: BusinessSoftwareAlliance [mailto:copyright@bsa.org] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 19, 2006 2:17 PM
To: George Poletes
Subject: Case ID 142141238 - Notice of Claimed Infringement

Wednesday, April 19, 2006

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207  US

RE:  Unauthorized Distribution of the following copyrighted computer
program(s):

Microsoft Windows

Dear George Poletes:

The Business Software Alliance (BSA) has determined that the connection
listed below, which appears to be using an Internet account under your
control, is using a eDonkey network to offer unlicensed copies of
copyrighted computer programs published by the BSA's member companies.

Site Details:
----------------------------------------------
Date Found: 19 Apr 2006 03:00:09 EDT (GMT -0400)
Network: eDonkey
IP Address: 67.18.158.26
IP Port: 4663
Protocol: eDonkey
UserName: 

Content being offered:
----------------------------------------------
Filename: Windows XP Media Center Edition 2005 SP2 espa
